content.rendered:
Directed by Vetrimaaran.

Written by Vetrimaaran.

Cast Dhanush(Anbu). Ameer Sultan(Rajan). Radha Ravi(Muthu). Daniel Balaji(Thambi). Kishore Kumar G.(Senthil). Samuthirakani(Guna). Pavan(Velu). Andrea Jeremiah(Chandra). Aishwarya Rajesh(Padma). Subramaniam Siva(Mani). Vincent Ashokan(Police Officer).G. Marimuthu. Sai Dheena(Jawa Pazhani). Hari Krishnan(Senthil’s Gangmember (as Hari)). Pavel(Guna’s Gangmember). Suryakanth(Padma’s Father).Sendrayan. Saran Shakthi(Padma’s Brother) . Joy Badlani(Seetharam)

Language Tamil.

Producers Dhanush. Vetrimaaran. S. Vinod Kumar.

Production Goldmines Telefilm. Grass Root Film Company. Lyca Productions.
